GetBone.description:
TOOL [Shared] 

[number] id
  The id of the object which was set in Tool:SetObject.

GetClientInfo.description:
TOOL [Shared] 

[string] name
  Name of the convar to retrieve. The function will automatically add the "mytoolfilename_" part to it.

GetClientNumber.description:
TOOL [Shared] Attempts to grab a clientside tool ConVar.

[string] name
  Name of the convar to retrieve. The function will automatically add the "mytoolfilename_" part to it.

[number] default=0
  The default value to return in case the lookup fails.

GetEnt.description:
TOOL [Shared] 

[number] id
  The id of the object which was set in Tool:SetObject.

GetServerInfo.description:
TOOL [Shared] 

[string] name
  Name of the convar to retrieve. The function will automatically add the "mytoolfilename_" part to it.

SetObject.description:
TOOL [Shared] Stores an Entity for later use in the tool.

[number] id
  The id of the object to store.

[Entity] ent
  The entity to store.

[Vector] pos
  The position to store.

[PhysObj] phys
  The physics object to store.

[number] bone
  The hit bone to store.

[Vector] norm
  The hit normal to store.

SetOperation.description:
TOOL [Shared] 

[number] operation
  The new operation ID to set.

SetStage.description:
TOOL [Shared] 

[number] stage
  The new stage to set.
